file_content.text: This is a new low, Raffid.
You're accusing me? If anyone--
Gentlemen, compose yourselves. Our esteemed guest has returned.
We are busy, bounty hunter, and as you can see, Baron Zacar is otherwise indisposed.
My nephew's last act was preparing a sum of credits. I can only assume they're yours.
This should cover it.
Looks about right.
Shame, I was starting to like the guy.
Poor Zacar.
I'm sure he would be touched.
How'd the baron bite it?
What happened to him?
My nephew was done in by a poisoned glass of wine. Obviously his overambitious progeny's doing.
I'm ambitious now? Why, uncle, stooping to compliments to slander me.
The baron has no further need of your services. I have to assume the burden of managing my nephew's estate.
As the baron's only son, I have first claim to succession, Heitor.
Your claim was forfeit the moment you killed your father. As regent, the title passes to me.
Actually, Father, the baron passed his authority to our advocate. Legally, the bounty hunter could name the new head of House Girard.
My job is finished. I've other places to be.
I'm done here.
What are you doing? Get back here and name me baron!
Why do either of you deserve to be baron?
Better make a good case.
Being my nephew's faithful right hand for years obviously makes me the most suited to this task. Besides....
I took a contract to destroy this house. All you did was start without me.
My job is to kill you. [Kill]
That'll be whichever one of you makes this worth my while.
Let's hear some offers.
I've accumulated a tidy sum over the years. Appoint me baron and I'll see you well-rewarded.
Ha! Heitor keeps his purse strings so tight he could garotte you with it.
Now you, you look radiant with the blush of power. Ever considered becoming a baroness?
Grant me my inheritance and I'll grant you a title. That's fair, right? You could make yourself at home whenever you like.
Should either one of them take over, we'll all end up paupers or lap dogs to the Thuls.
Advocate, I would show extreme gratitude to the man who named me successor.
Advocate, you've already helped me work toward escaping the chattel role I'm relegated to.
If you would finally liberate me from these buffoons, I would be very grateful.
Enough pandering. What's your decision, advocate?
Raffid's the next of kin. He gets it.
The young hothead.
You hear that, Heitor? You'll be answering to me now.
I should have expected you two hoodlums to be as thick as thieves.
I'd have you charged with murder, but lording over you sounds more fun.
Now, I expect lords will want to foist their prudish little darlings on me--best put a stop to that.
Care to be the lady of the house? No obligation toward fidelity, of course.
Let's just keep it at no obligations. Period.
I'd prefer something more casual.
A kindred spirit. Let me introduce you to that Johrian whiskey I was telling you about.
A kindred spirit. Let's get you out of that armor and into something more comfortable.
My, you are quite the animal. Stay awhile?
Don't call me, I'll call you.
Not a chance.
This seems oddly familiar....
Sorry, got a job to do. I'll be sure to make conjugal visits.
Would if I could.
Try not to lose any parts I might miss.
Some other time, handsome. Don't get in too much trouble without me.
Would if I could.
Wouldn't dream of it.
And what? cuddle? Want me to get your mommy on my way out, sugar?
Pathetic.
I retract my previous statement. Run along.
Works for me.
Come, dear, let's forgo the nuptials and proceed to the honeymoon.
You're disgusting.
More the commitment type? Pity. Aitalla? You?
If such a farce will keep my own suitors away, consider it done.
Aitalla, I offer you my hand. Provided we never consummate the marriage and pursue our own interests.
I find that arrangement more than acceptable.
Welcome to the family, bounty hunter. Make yourself at home whenever you like.
I'm going with Aitalla.
Princess here.
Father, I shan't have need of your counsel as vicebaron. You may consider yourself a "lord in waiting."
This is your gratitude for rearing you to adulthood?
Think of it as a reward for all the years you devoted to raising me as a commodity.
As for you, Raffid, you are hereby banished from House Girard.
What? You can't! Where will I go?
When have you ever had trouble finding a bed? I'm sure you'll be fine.
Now, my champion, I'd like to reward you for the great service you've done me today. Shall we retire?
I didn't pick you on account of your looks.
That won't be necessary.
I've given you no good reason to help me, yet you have continued to do so.
It'll probably be your reward.
Really now? I was under the impression that you were paid for different services entirely.
You better not be stringing me along.
This won't be an act again.
Don't be crass. I have every intention of making good use of you.
Mmmm. You've served admirably... now, be a darling and show yourself out.
You've got my number.
Not a problem.
Be seeing you.
You really know how to make a guy feel special.
That was... blunt.
You expected something more? Haha, charming.
What exactly did they teach you in prep school?
Hardly worth the trouble.
Perhaps you should have courted a tramp and not a lady. Now shoo.
I can handle things from here, advocate.
Thanks to you, I can now take control of my life.
All right, Heitor. It's yours.
I'll say the old man.
Raffid, you are charged with patricide. Aitalla, you will be married on the morrow.
You won't get away with this!
You can't force me to marry.
Your objections are noted... and disregarded.
Here, advocate--gratuity for making the right choice. Consider yourself released from duty.
I'd just cuffed the whelp for scuffing my boot with the stirrup when--ugh. Abominable.
Just ignore it, maybe it'll wander away.
What's a beautiful young thing like you doing hanging on the arm of this old prune?
[Flirt] You could do better.
I was so overwhelmed by your charm and good looks that I thought I might faint.
He can have that effect on people, my lady; wouldn't be the first time I caught a swooning maiden. You're in good hands.
Am I now?
Get away, you filthy creature.
You want to try another sleazeball line or are you done embarrassing yourself?
You have some nerve to blunder in here, insult me and make indecent advances toward my daughter.
My my, what have we here?
I'm looking for the Durasteel Duke.
Where's the duke?
Durasteel Duke? What is this roughneck babbling about?
Duke Corwin... you old dotard.
Is that what they call him? How quaint.
Nice place you've got here. So what's on tap?
Mind if I join the party?
Raffid, have the help fetch something palatable to our new guest. Some trough water, perhaps.
That's kind, Father, but are we certain they can spare a bucket?
Ah, true. As you can see, your arrival is imposing upon our hospitality.
You look bored, handsome. Why don't you get me a drink?
[Flirt] My thoughts exactly.
Really? I wouldn't peg him as your type. He is pretty cute, though.
Johrian whiskey? You strike me as a lady who likes something with a little bite.
Stop encouraging her, Raffid, you need no more opportunities to drag our family's name through the mud.
You must leave. Now. And use the servant's exit. People would talk if they saw someone of your ilk here.
I'm just here on business.
I'm not here for trouble.
Guess I should have worn my other blaster.
It's the dress code, isn't it?
You know, Heitor, he's quite the wag. I think we should keep him around.
Guess I should have worn my strapless blast vest.
It's the dress code, isn't it?
Now that would have been a sight to see.
Do shut up, Raffid, or I'll be speaking to your father.
Must you two squabble in front of our guests? You're causing more of a stir than our visitor here.
People are gonna talk after I blast you out of your boots.
Better watch your mouth.
Are you going to take that, Heitor?
It's armed and armored. Let's be serious. The guards may deal with this creature.
That's the first sensible thing that you've suggested since this started.
She's armed and armored. I'm hardly going to wrestle her to the ground.
Don't talk like that, Father. It is beneath your station.
Absolutely not. Leave immediately. Do not force me to defend my honor.
Don't be ridiculous, Father. This is a matter for the guards.
Ladies, gentlemen, please. Return to the festivities. I will have a few words with our esteemed guest here.
You the boss around here?
Only if you're in charge.
You could put it that way, yes.
Glad to meet somebody civil.
Finally!
Forgive my relations, they have a low threshold for impropriety.
You better pick those words more carefully than your friends here.
I've had enough lip.
I will deal with you respectfully if you extend me the same courtesy.
You aren't seriously considering dealing with this thug?
Uncle, please, I have the situation well in hand. Return to the festivities. This is not a request.
I believe I know why you're here, but this is a discussion best held in private.
Please wait in my office. I'll be right with you.
